item.title: Using dnsmasq for your Homelab
item.description: Like many of you, I run a homelab for a number of reasons. Not the least of which is for the following: Testing Configurations of Virtual Hypervisors Testing Software and Application Configurations A File Server for the Home Media Tools and Storage Mostly, my lab is for the latter… as I host a 22TB Local Media server in my Homelab. The Media is being hosted using Plex, my all-time favorite media server software.
